en-US.summary: Search the Ocean Archive for playable audio content.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Ocean Archive to search for humpback
en-US.name: ocean-archive
en-US.description: Ocean Archive is a digital platform in the making; an archive and framework for collaborative research. It brings together a multitude of Ocean voices and stories and connects those striving to nurture and protect it. This skill lets you search the audio content of the Archive.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Alexa, ask Ocean Archive to search for humpback.
